monero.daemon

Interface MoneroDaemon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoneroDaemonDefault, MoneroDaemonRpc

    public interface MoneroDaemon
    Monero daemon interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockCount

        MoneroBlockCount getBlockCount()
        Get how many blocks are in the longest chain known to the node.
        Returns:
        MoneroBlockCount contains the block count and response status

      • getBlockHash

        java.lang.String getBlockHash(int height)
        Get a block's hash by its height.
        Parameters:
        height - is the height of the block hash to get
        Returns:
        String is the block hash at the given height

      • getBlockTemplate

        MoneroBlockTemplate getBlockTemplate(java.lang.String walletAddress,
                                     int reserveSize)
        Get a block template for mining a new block.
        Parameters:
        walletAddress - is the address of the wallet to receive coinbase transactions if block is successfully mined
        reserveSize - is the reserve size
        Returns:
        MoneroBlockTemplate is a block template for mining a new block

        Parameters:
        blockBlob - is the mined block to submit
        Returns:
        MoneroDaemonModel contains response status
